text: Guinea has been to every Summer Olympic Games since 1968 except for 1972 and 1976. The country has never won an Olympic medal. Guinea has never been in any Winter Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee was formed in 1964 and recognized by the International Olympic Committee in 1965. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Guinea profile at London2012.com Category:Guinea Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Guinea at the Olympics
